title: ITPO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Young Professional Posts
description: The India Trade Promotion Organisation (ITPO) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Young Professional Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the ITPO Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. ...
